Articles.Content:
Hi, I'm finally running 64 bit client on Linux after reading the long long Linux compatibility thread. Now KSP is feeding 4.8 GB of RAM with tons of mods!!

However, I found that hitting 'Enter' key in craft editor mode(both in VAB and SPH) automatically clicks the stage 'Reset' button and nullifying my asparagus setup. This is painful especially when I'm working on vehicle description since I cannot change lines when typing...

Also, hitting arrow keys while the craft description window moves my camera too.

Is there any workaround or solution?

My OS is Gubuntu...errrr.... Ubuntu GNOME 13.10... I'll post my system spec if needed.
